description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. As the Ninja Guardian of Earth it is your duty to protect the planet from "Evil Samurai Warlord", an evil samurai warlord bent on destroying the Earth's natural beauty. Ninja must jump on platforms and attack his enemies to propel himself upward and confront his nemesis.
description.short: As the Ninja Guardian of Earth it is your duty to protect the planet from "Evil Samurai Warlord", an evil samurai warlord bent on destroying the Earth's natural beauty. Ninja must jump on platforms and attack his enemies to propel himself upward and confront his nemesis.
